Claim: "A woman with an orange and gray shirt is fixing something."
Referring expressions: Woman, orange and gray shirt, something  Something, being repaired.
Formula: (exists c (exists a (IsInOrangeAndGrayShirt(c) and IsFixing(a))) & (forall f (  IsFixing(f) ->  IsBeingRepaired(f))) & (forall g ( IsBeingRepaired(g) ->   IsFixing(g)))) -> (exists a (IsBeingRepaired(a)))
